Package co.edu.unbosque.model.persistence

Class BetplayDAO

java.lang.Object
co.edu.unbosque.model.persistence.BetplayDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
CRUDOperation
public class BetplayDAO extends Object implements CRUDOperation
Clase que representa un DAO (Data Access Object) para gestionar operaciones relacionadas con BetplayDTO.
